name: The Gold Standard
description:
The Gold Standard was a game made for a university project. You are a hacker who has hacked into the security system of multiple billionaire mansions. Draw a path for your accomplice to move along, while you distract guards to get past them. Steal the valuables and get out of there.

This game was made by...

  • Daniel Buckley
  • Andrew Hibble
  • Crystal Nugent

Animators

  • Kat Latcham
  • Sophie Gower
  • Max Normand
  • Aiden Ranger
  • Gracen Wilcox

Audio

  • Kyle Humphrey

The game is not complete, as production of it has ended. There are a few bugs and issues with the systems.
